definitions.definition: To predict or believe that something will happen
definitions.example: He never expected to be discovered.
You are expected to get the task done by the end of next week.

definitions.definition: (continuous aspect only, of a woman or couple) To be pregnant, to consider a baby due.
The process by which somebody expects something.
Of a woman or female animal, in expectation of giving birth; pregnant.
definitions.example: The expecting mother is enthusiastic about learning childcare.
